@graph.name: About Route4Me - Last Mile Transportation Platform
@graph.description: Route4Me helps businesses conquer last mile complexity with proven route optimization technology. Over 3 billion miles optimized across 750M destinations, delivering Carbon-neutral last mile efficiency.
@graph.keywords: last mile optimization, route optimization technology, transportation platform, carbon-neutral logistics, delivery optimization, fleet management, route planning software, logistics solution, last mile efficiency, delivery routing, transportation management, business operations, customer service optimization

@graph.name: Route4Me Last Mile Transportation Platform
@graph.description: Route4Me helps growing businesses conquer last mile complexity to scale efficiently and deliver trusted customer service. With over 3 billion miles optimized across 750M destinations and 30 million routes, our patented route optimization technology sets the industry standard for speed, simplicity and scalability. The Route4Me last mile transportation platform integrates mission-critical workflows to improve routing, dispatch, tracking, driver efficiency, operations and customer experience, while our analytics enable continuous improvement with strategic and real-time insights. More than 40,000 customers rely on Route4Me to increase productivity, reduce costs, and ensure customer satisfaction.
